name: GiftHunter II
description:
60 seconds to Collect Gifts & Survive a Sinister Season of Sharing!

  • Sequel to the wildly unimpressive GiftHunter featuring fellow MODs BlinkOk and our old friend Scraggle!
  • WARNING: May be disturbing to some. If a mild scare isn't appreciated by you, please do not play inside my mind.
  • You must SURVIVE to keep your Gifts!
  • WIN Version = Randomly Generated Terrain; HTML will load 1 of 10 pre-gnerated maps each play.
  • This was an unfinished project from 2021 now Resurrected for fellow TGC Forumites to Enjoy this Holiday Season!
  • Yes, us MODs are Primatives assembled in-game, just like Real Life!
  • Come get some :)

HTML Controls:

  • [WASD] = Move/Strafe
  • [ArrowKeys ] = Look
  • [Space] = Continue

WIN Controls:

  • Controller (make sure to plug it in before launching):
    • [LeftStick] = Move/Strafe
    • [RightStick] = Look
    • [Button 1] = Continue
  • Mouse + Keyboard:
    • [WASD] = Move/Strafe
    • [Mouse] = Look
    • [LMB] = Continue
    • [RMB] =Toggle Mouselook
